headline: Go has a debuggerâ€”and it's awesome!
keywords: RRDNS, Tools, DNS, Reliability, Programming, Go, Developers
description: Something that often, uh... bugs Go developers is the lack of a proper debugger. Builds are ridiculously fast and easy, but sometimes it would be nice to just set a breakpoint and step through that endless if chain or print a bunch of values without recompiling ten times.
